data.name: pillowfort darkcyan
data.description: Dark, ups the default font size, gets rid of the hideous blue and tidies things up a bit.

data.name: 方角微博 · 美化版（Square-Weibo_Prettify）
data.description:
keyword:weibo,微博,sina,新浪,渣浪 适用于 新浪微博 V6 版 把用户头像圆框还原为正方形，去广告，宽屏样式，去卡片化，重新排版。 主色调从 骚黄 换成 清新养眼防近视绿，启用半透明配色。 100%色值替换，无残留；透明度细节完整拼贴，无错位缺块。 建议使用浅色模板，并选用耐看的装扮背景。 维护支持： http://huching.net/2015/04/cssstyle/ （建议反馈 bug 提交可到此留言。） 特点：
  • 重写单条微博控件边框属性；
  • 支持响应式 @media screen；
  • 去冗余内容，宽屏；
  • 去掉用户主页左侧非必要模块；
  • 去掉主页头像处悬停时的黄色光晕；
  • 屏蔽搜索框下拉热词 ；
  • 屏蔽 "好友圈、好友关注、好友赞过 " ；
  • 屏蔽微博尾巴超链接；
———————————————————— 或许你在找： style 107050 尊重微博原有配色风格，无需重新适应成本。 更多细节等你发掘！！ —————————— 颜色当初都是随手选的，现在整理了一下，有需要的可以自行调教（不建议）

user.name: 云三
user.about: Buy me a coffee :-)

data.name: Zoom - Marshmallow
data.description: Tired of destroying your eyes with the white whiteness of zoom in 8:00 in the morning? This theme is for you.

data.name: Dark scrollbar for all websites
data.description: A scrollbar style that applies to every website.

data.name: Rozetka.com.ua  Dark
Hide left sidebar on StackOverflow, StackExchange
data.description: Hides the left sidebar on StackOverflow and StackExchange which only exists to upsell you on their other products.

data.name: Hide sidebars on StackOverflow and StackExchange
data.description: On the left hand and right hand side of the content on both StackOverflow and StackExchange there are panes of content that exists only to lure the user onto different things than what she was there for. This style removes it.

data.name: Red Chessbase board for chess.com
data.description: Red CB board for Chess.com. It looks good.
data.css:
@-moz-document domain("chess.com")
{
  div[class^="daily-puzzle-board"],
div[class^="game-preview"],
div[class^="board chessboard-component"],
div[class^="board v-board chessboard-component"],
div[class^="board rounded"],
div[class^="board rounded fippled"],
div[class^="board fippled rounded"],
div[class^="board disabled rounded"],
div[class^="board-layout-chessboard board-board"],
div[id$="_ChessBoard_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_openingboard_1"],
div[id^="board_training"],
div[id^="divBoard_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_tactics_board"],
div[id^="chessboard_"],
div[id*="chessboard_"],
div[id^="chess_com_chessmentorboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_chessmentorboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_chessmentor_board_1_boardarea"],
div[id^="chess_com_emailboard_"],
div[id*="chess_com_emailboard_"]
  {
    background-image: url("https://i.imgur.com/65WvDIu.jpg")!important;
  }
}
